mapper.select: select distinct ur.userId, rr.resId from tRoleResource as rr join tRoleUser as ur on rr.roleId=ur.roleId order by ur.userId, rr.resId
mapper.insert:
insert into tUserResource (id, userId, resId, createUserId, createTime, lastUpdateTime) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.userId}, #{item.resId}, #{item.createUserId}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.lastUpdateTime})
